purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module to record an involvement in an individual activity.
The nature of an involvement in an individual activity may be specified by indicating a class of involvement in which it is a member.

example.p: The involvment of John Doe, who is a stress engineer at Joe Bloggs and Co. in the stress analysis of part XYZ_123 carried out on 2001-05-02 is an individual_involvement_in_activity.
This individual involvement is classified as a member of the class_of_involvement_in_activity 'stress analysis performer'.

li.p: a individual product, document, person, organization or other activity that is involved in an individual activity.

li.note: Class of involvement in activity is within the scope of the Class_of_involvement_in_activity application module.

li.p: membership of a class of involvement in activity.
li.note: Membership of a class of involvement in activity is within the scope of the Activity_structure_and_classification application module.

uof.name: Individual_involvement_in_activity
uof.description: The Individual_involvement_in_activity UoF identifies an individual involvement in an activity and defines the thing that play a role.
